channel.title: Homes on Vishwas's website
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Vishwas's website

item.description: Biography I would like to call myself as a Fullstack Hardware design engineer as I love building electronics hardware from scratch to a product level which can solve real-world problems. As we all know necessity is the mother of invention, I strongly believe that we engineers are here to solve the real life problems not to create one. Currently I work as and Research and Development Engineer at Tejas Networks.

item.title: Recent Posts
item.description: LoRa - Long range Communication for IoT Traction: My work got featured in Deccan Herald News Paper

item.title: Projects
item.description: Vega - Drone Health Monitoring Systems April 2019 to August 2019 IGo-Advanced Driver Assist System February 2019 to March 2019 ICense February 2019 to March 2019 Smart Soft Switch November 2018 to January 2019 Smart switch based on Infineon’s CoolMOS MOSFET for spark-free switching of drones and electric vehicles IEncode Intelligent Encoder for Industrial Motors Aug. 2018 to Sept. 2018 Predictive maintenance of Industrial motors using Infineon’s high precision 3D magnetic sensor TLE-493D

item.title: Achievements
item.description: Bring Intelligence to the Real world by Microsoft, Avnet, Octonian and Hackster.io September 2019 Won the 1st prize for ‘BEST USE CASE FOR REAL LIFE PRACTICAL APPLICATION’ Revolutionize Your IoT prototyping by NXP and Hackster.io March 2019 Won best project award in SMART BUILDING category CPDM, IISc REIMAGINE WASTE Hackathon ReImagine Waste, CPDM, IISc. Sept. 2018 Won the special prize in the hackathon Sensing the world in all three dimensions Infineon Technologies and Hackster.
